entry.title: Today in DeFi - Synthetix Perps V2 Live, Waves USDN Resolution Plan, Delta-Neutral Strategies, and More...
entry.summary: Synthetix Perps V2 Live Synthetix launches perps v2 with frontends on Optimism. Perps V2 reduces perps fees by using an off-chain oracle system and minimizes risks for perps LPs with new risk management features. Waves USDN Resolution Plan Waves team released a resolution plan for its severely depegged stablecoin USDN, aiming to stabilize the peg with proposals including token backings, team donations, swap reactivation, incentives for reserve holders, and adaptive vesting for USDN holders.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Symbiosis V2, OpenOcean Swap Aggregator, IL-less DEX, and More...
entry.summary: Symbiosis V2 Cross-chain AMM Symbiosis launches V2, enabling a serving network (Boba BNB L2) and single-sided AMM pool, making it easier to support more chains and increasing pool efficiency. OpenOcean Cross-chain Swap OpenOcean launches 1-click cross-chain swap, supporting multiple chains with better swap rates and better UX by implementing Celerâ€™s IM Framework.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - NEAR MetaMask Compatibility, Sturdy V1, Trading Perps on Solana, and More...
entry.summary: NEAR MetaMask Compatibility NEAR developer Proximity Labs releases NETH, a smart contract that allows users to directly interact with NEAR dApps using their Ethereum wallets, such as MetaMask. Sturdy V1 Live Lending protocol Sturdy releases a revamped UI for 1.0, including integrated information and historical yield graphs. Sturdy also expands into the ETH market and will allow users to deposit LSDs as collateral to borrow ETH.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Fluidity Live, Visa Autopayments, Trading Expirables on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Fluidity Live Fluidity, a protocol that rewards users for actually using their cryptos, is live on Ethereum. Users can wrap their tokens into fAssets and start earning rewards for transacting. The rewards are generated by user assets lent to money markets.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - multiBTC Live, SBF Arrested, Ren to Shut Down 1.0, and More...
entry.summary: Product Launches ğŸš€ Multichain multiBTC Live Multichain launches multiBTC and a BTC bridge. Meanwhile, Curve launches a multiBTC/WBTC/sBTC pool and launched a proposal vote for adding liquidity incentives to the pool. Yearn veYFI Live Yearn launched the staking UI for veYFI. Previously, users can take part in governance using YFI, and going forward veYFI will be the only governance token on Yearn.

Phi Launches on Polygon Phi.xyz, a metaverse project built around ENS & wallet activities, launches Phi Land & Phi Quest on Polygon, allowing users to create lands and/or explore quests of projects.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn veYFI Live, Sushi Voting to Increase Treasury Ratio, Trading Volatility, and More...
entry.summary: Yearn veYFI Live Yearn launches UI for users to stake YFI for veYFI. Previously, users can take part in governance using YFI, and going forward veYFI will be the only governance token on Yearn. Signal Vote: Increase Sushi Kanpai Payout Ratio The Sushiswap community is voting to produce a signal on whether to redirect 100% of the Sushi fees redirect to the Kanpai Treasury for 1-year.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - MakerDAO Key Deployments, SBF Arrested, Interest-Free Borrowing, and More...
entry.summary: MakerDAO Key Deployments Maker executed a bunch of proposals today. Key deployments include DSR Savings increase to 1%, GNO onboarding, and renBTC-A offboarding, among other changes. SBF Arrested SBF has been arrested in the Bahamas the day before appearing before Congress. Reports say the US is likely to request extradition.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maple Cuts Orthogonal, APE Staking Live, Lending on BnB Chain, and More...
entry.summary: Maple Cuts Orthogonal Orthogonal Trading, a crypto firm that has funds stuck on FTX, and is also a significant borrower on lending protocol Maple Finance, has defaulted on eight loans totalling $36 million on Maple. Creditor M11 Credit issued a default notice to Orthogonal for its loans, while Maple severed all ties with Orthogonal for misrepresenting its financial position.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ankr aBNB Exploit, Fantom Gas Monetization, Explore Delta Neutral Strategies, and More...
entry.summary: Ankr aBNBc Exploit BnB chain node operator Ankr suffered a governance key compromise. The attacker d deployed a malicious contract to mint a very large amount of aBNBc, Ankrâ€™s reward-bearing staked BNB token, and profited ~$7m by dumping what he minted.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aave Freezes V2 Markets, AdaSwap Live on Cardano, Trading NFT Perps, and More...
entry.summary: Aave Freezes V2 Markets Aave governance has temporarily frozen 17 lending markets on V2 to fend off further liquidity attacks. Paused markets include YFI, CRV, ZRX, MANA, 1INCH, MKR, etc. AdaSwap Live on Cardano Mainnet Cardano-based DEX Adaswap is now live on mainnet, enabling trading & bridging for Cardano tokens and NFTs.
